title: Dr. Dennis Ulbrich
text:
E-Mail
  

  
  


I am interested in different topics of pure and applied mathematics, thereby touching the broad fields of analysis, ergodic theory and dynamical systems.
Most recently, I worked as a lecturer and research assistant at HS Bremen.
Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Institute for Analysis and Numerics of the University of Münster supervised by Prof. Dr. M. Pirner.
I obtained my PhD (Dr. rer. nat.) in Mathematics at the University of Bremen under the supervison of Prof. Dr. J. Rademacher and Prof. Dr. M. Keßeböhmer.
Further details and additional information can be found in my CV.
